segments.text: This kitchen scene is quite a study in contrasts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The domestic calm is undermined by several unfolding events.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is just a constant flow, not stopping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the water spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's obliviousness to it all is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame to see such potential damage to the cabinetry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage is so difficult and costly to repair.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, they're playing a dangerous game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is definitely going to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to slip on that wet floor too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me worry about the inevitable aftermath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This happy domestic setting is about to turn into a disaster zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a rather depressing thought, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everyone comes out of this unscathed.
segments.speaker: PAR
